description: This file initializes a knowledge base with CSV documents, sets up a vector database, and performs queries with specific filters, involving data related to sales, surveys, and financial reports.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying vector data.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base built from CSV files, supporting loading and querying.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base, capable of performing searches and generating responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample CSV files for knowledge filtering tests.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent based on a query and filters.
